item.title: Test
item.description: #include "minhook/include/MinHook.h" typedef DWORD( NTAPI *pNtDelayExecution )( IN BOOLEAN Alertable, IN PLARGE_INTEGER DelayInterval ); extern pNtDelayExecution pOrigNtDelayExecution = (pNtDelayExecution)GetProcAddress( GetModuleHandle( L"ntdll.dll" ), "NtDelayExecution" ); DWORD NTAPI NtDelayExecution( IN BOOLEAN Alertable, IN PLARGE_INTEGER DelayInterval ) { // Intercept whatever MessageBoxA( 0, "NO SLEEP 4 U", "BTFO", 0 ); // Return legit function ? return pOrigNtDelayExecution( Alertable, (PLARGE_INTEGER)0 ); } DWORD WINAPI InitHooksThread( LPVOID param ) { // MinHook itself requires initialisation, lets do this // before we hook specific API calls.
